In terms of what would help: your stated flexibility (immediate confirmation, flexible start date, and readiness to complete paperwork promptly) is appreciated and would make enrollment straightforward if we are in a position to make an offer. That said, it does not override our priority ordering.

If you would like to remain actively under consideration, you are welcome to submit a fresh formal application again in a future round. If the place is still available when we reach your position in our priority order, we would then be able to move quickly.

Sincerely,
